#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;


int main()
{

int t;
cin>>t;

char str1[55];


while(t--)
{
    cin>>str1;
    int len=strlen(str1);

    int mid=len/2;
     mid--;
     int check=mid;

    while(mid>=0)
    {
        cout<<str1[mid];
        mid--;
    }
    int i=len-1;

    while(i>check)
    {
        cout<<str1[i];
        i--;
    }


cout<<endl;

}



 return 0;

}
